data.name: BaseDocumentImageUri

data.name: BaseDocumentProperties
data.value: Provides access to the current document's properties.

data.name: BaseDocumentTag
data.value: Gets or sets an object that contains data on the current BaseDocument object.

data.name: BaseGalleryAllowHoverImages
data.value: Gets or sets whether the hover images feature is enabled.

data.name: BaseGalleryAllowMarqueeSelection
data.value: Gets or sets whether the marquee selection feature is enabled, which allows gallery items to be selected by dragging over items with the mouse.

data.name: BaseGalleryAppearance
data.value: Gets the appearances that are used to paint gallery elements.

data.name: BaseGalleryCheckDrawMode
data.value: Gets or sets how gallery items are painted when in the checked state.

data.name: BaseGalleryCheckSelectedItemViaKeyboard
data.value: Gets or sets whether the gallery item currently selected via the keyboard should be immediately checked.

data.name: BaseGalleryClearSelectionOnClickEmptySpace
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current selection is cleared when clicking the empty space.

data.name: BaseGalleryColumnCount
data.value: Gets or sets the (maximum) number of columns in the gallery.

data.name: BaseGalleryDistanceBetweenItems
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between Gallery items.

data.name: BaseGalleryDistanceItemCaptionToDescription
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between an item's caption and its description.

data.name: BaseGalleryDistanceItemImageToText
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between an item's image and its text.

data.name: BaseGalleryDrawImageBackground
data.value: Gets or sets whether the background of the Gallery item's image is displayed.

data.name: BaseGalleryFirstItemVertAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the first gallery item's vertical position beyond which this item cannot be moved when scrolling backwards.(When the gallery is horizontally oriented (see GalleryControlGallery.Orientation), the FirstItemVertAlignment property defines the fist item's horizontal position.

data.name: BaseGalleryFirstItemVertIndent
data.value: Gets or sets a custom indent of the first gallery item from the gallery's top or left edge (depending on the gallery's orientation). The property is in effect when BaseGallery.FirstItemVertAlignment is set to Custom.

data.name: BaseGalleryFixedHoverImageSize
data.value: Gets or sets whether hover images are displayed with the same size.

data.name: BaseGalleryFixedImageSize
data.value: Gets or sets whether gallery item images have the same display size, as specified by the BaseGallery.ImageSize property.

data.name: BaseGalleryHoverImages
data.value: Gets or sets the source of hover images.

data.name: BaseGalleryHoverImageSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of hover images.

data.name: BaseGalleryImages
data.value: Gets or sets the source of images that can be displayed within gallery items.

data.name: BaseGalleryImageSize
data.value: Gets or sets the display size of gallery item images.

data.name: BaseGalleryItemAutoSizeMode
data.value: Gets or sets the auto-size mode of gallery items.

data.name: BaseGalleryItemCheckMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether item checking (selection) is enabled, and how the items can be checked (selected).

data.name: BaseGalleryItemImageLayout
data.value: Gets or sets how a gallery item's image is displayed within the item's image area.

data.name: BaseGalleryItemImageLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the location of images within gallery items, relative to the items' text.

data.name: BaseGalleryItemImagePadding
data.value: Gets or sets the amount of space, in pixels, between the Gallery item's image and its borders.

data.name: BaseGalleryItemSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of gallery items when item auto-sizing is disabled. The Width attribute is also in effect when the auto-height feature is enabled.

data.name: BaseGalleryItemTextPadding
data.value: Gets or sets the amount of space, in pixels, between the Gallery item's text and its borders.

data.name: BaseGalleryLastItemVertAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the last gallery item's vertical position, beyond which this item cannot be moved when scrolling forwards.(When the gallery is horizontally oriented (see GalleryControlGallery.Orientation), the LastItemVertAlignment property defines the last item's horizontal position.

data.name: BaseGalleryLastItemVertIndent
data.value: Gets or sets a custom indent of the last gallery item from the gallery's bottom or right edge (depending on the gallery's orientation). The property is in effect when BaseGallery.LastItemVertAlignment is set to Custom.

data.name: BaseGalleryMaxItemWidth
data.value: Gets or sets an item's maximum width in GalleryItemAutoSizeMode.Default auto-size mode.

data.name: BaseGalleryOptionsImageLoad
data.value: Provides access to the set of properties that manage image loading options for items in this gallery.

data.name: BaseGalleryRowCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of rows in a gallery when the gallery is displayed within a dropdown window.

data.name: BaseGalleryScrollMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the gallery is scrolled when the ScrollTo method is called.

data.name: BaseGalleryScrollSpeed
data.value: Gets or sets how fast the gallery is scrolled when calling the ScrollTo method.

data.name: BaseGalleryShowGroupCaption
data.value: Gets or sets whether group captions are displayed.

data.name: BaseGalleryShowItemText
data.value: Gets or sets whether Gallery items display their caption and description.

data.name: BaseGalleryTag
data.value: Gets or sets an object that contains data on the current BaseGallery object.

data.name: BaseGalleryUseMaxImageSize
data.value: Gets or sets whether gallery item images have the same display size as the biggest image.

data.name: BaseTileAppearances
data.value: Provides access to appearance settings used to paint the current Tile in different visual states.

data.name: BaseTileBackgroundImage
data.value: Gets or sets a background image for the current Tile.

data.name: BaseTileElements
data.value: Provides access to the TileItemElements collection used to build the current Tile's content.

data.name: BaseTileEnabled

data.name: BaseTileExcludeFromSearch
data.value: Gets or sets whether this tile should be removed from the list of places where the Search Panel looks for the entered text.

data.name: BaseTileFrames
data.value: Provides access to the TileItemFrames collection used to build the current Tile's animation.

data.name: BaseTileGroup
data.value: Gets or sets a group where the current Tile belongs.

data.name: BaseTilePadding
data.value: Gets or sets the amount of space between the content of the current Tile and its border.

data.name: BaseTileProperties
data.value: Provides access to the current Tile's settings.

data.name: BaseTileSearchTags
data.value: Gets or sets the collection of string tags for this BaseTile. The Search Panel will check these tags for the desired text.

data.name: BaseTileTag
data.value: Gets or sets the current Tile's tag.

data.name: BaseTileVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current Tile is visible.

data.name: BaseViewAllowHotkeyNavigation
data.value: Gets or sets whether switching between tabbed documents using keyboard shortcuts is allowed.

data.name: BaseViewAllowResetLayout
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current DocumentManager's layout can be reset to default.

data.name: BaseViewAppearance
data.value: Contains appearance settings for the current View.

data.name: BaseViewBackgroundImage
data.value: Gets or sets the current DocumentManager's background image.

data.name: BaseViewBackgroundImageLayoutMode
data.value: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the ImageLayoutMode enumeration.

data.name: BaseViewBackgroundImageStretchMargins
data.value: Gets or sets stretching margins for a DocumentManager's background image in a View.

data.name: BaseViewDocumentProperties
data.value: Provides access to properties common to all documents within the current View.

data.name: BaseViewDocumentSelectorProperties
data.value: Provides access to appearance settings used for a Document Selector within the current view.

data.name: BaseViewFloatingDocumentContainer
data.value: Gets or sets a type of container for floating documents within the current BaseView.

data.name: BaseViewLoadingIndicatorProperties
data.value: Provides access to appearance settings used for a loading indicator within the current BaseView.

data.name: BaseViewOptionsLayout
data.value: Gets the object containing properties related to the current View's layout.

data.name: BaseViewUseDocumentSelector
data.value: Gets or sets if a Document Selector is enabled for the current Document Manager.

data.name: BaseViewUseLoadingIndicator
data.value: Gets or sets if a loading indicator for deferred load should be used.

data.name: BaseViewUseSnappingEmulation
data.value: Gets or sets whether this BaseView uses snapping emulation for its child documents.

data.name: BaseViewWindowsDialogProperties
data.value: Gets an object containing settings related to the current DocumentManager's Windows dialog.

data.name: ButtonEventArgsButton
data.value: Gets a custom header button or a custom Win8 button associated with the current event.

data.name: CustomHeaderButtonEventArgsButton
data.value: Gets the clicked button.

data.name: CustomHeaderButtonEventArgsDocument
data.value: Gets the selected document.

data.name: DefaultBarAndDockingControllerController
data.value: Gets the DefaultBarAndDockingController.

data.name: DockingOptionsAutoHidePanelVerticalTextOrientation
data.value: Specifies the vertical direction of auto-hidden panel captions.

data.name: DockingOptionsCloseActiveFloatTabOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether only a dock panel corresponding to the active tab within a floating container can be closed upon clicking the close button.

data.name: DockingOptionsCloseActiveTabOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether only the dock panel corresponding to the currently active tab in a tab container is closed when the close button within the tab container's caption is clicked. The option is not in effect when the tab container is in the floating state.

data.name: DockingOptionsCursorFloatCanceled
data.value: Gets or sets the cursor that indicates that a dock panel cannot be floating during a dock operation.

data.name: DockingOptionsDockPanelInCaptionRegion
data.value: Gets or sets whether a panel can be docked as a tab to another panel while dragging over its header.

data.name: DockingOptionsDockPanelInTabContainerTabRegion
data.value: Gets or sets whether the panel is immediately docked while dragging over the tab region or the panel is docked when it is dropped.

data.name: DockingOptionsHideImmediatelyOnAutoHide
data.value: Gets or sets whether dock panels are immediately hidden when their auto hide functionality is enabled.

data.name: DockingOptionsShowCaptionImage
data.value: Gets or sets whether an image associated with a dock panel is displayed within the panel's caption.

data.name: DockingOptionsShowCaptionOnMouseHover
data.value: Gets or sets whether the dock panel's caption is shown only when the mouse pointer hovers over the panel's top or all the time.

data.name: DockManagerActiveChildChanged
data.value: Fires after the panel's active child has been changed.

data.name: DockManagerActivePanelChanged
data.value: Fires after the active dock panel has been changed.

data.name: DockManagerAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether all DockPanels within the DockManager should paint their icons in the panel's foreground colors.

data.name: DockManagerAppearancesActiveTab
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the active tab within a tab container.

data.name: DockManagerAppearancesFloatFormCaption
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the float forms' captions.

data.name: DockManagerAppearancesFloatFormCaptionActive
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the caption of an active float form.

data.name: DockManagerAppearancesHideContainer
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the auto hide containers.

data.name: DockManagerAppearancesHidePanelButton
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the panel's button in the auto hide container.

data.name: DockManagerAppearancesHidePanelButtonActive
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint a panel's button in the auto hide container when it's hot-tracked or the panel it corresponds to is displayed.

data.name: DockManagerAppearancesPanel
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint dock panels.

data.name: DockManagerAppearancesPanelCaption
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint dock panels' captions.

data.name: DockManagerAppearancesPanelCaptionActive
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the active panel's caption.

data.name: DockManagerAppearancesTabs
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint a tab panel and its inactive tabs.

data.name: DockManagerAutoHideSpeed
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies the auto-hide speed of dock panels.

data.name: DockManagerBeforeLoadLayout
data.value: Occurs before a layout is restored from storage (a stream, xml file or the system registry).

data.name: DockManagerClosedPanel
data.value: Occurs after a panel has been closed.

data.name: DockManagerClosingPanel
data.value: Occurs when a panel is closing.

data.name: DockManagerController
data.value: Gets or sets the BarAndDockingController that will provide the default appearance options for the dock panels belonging to the current dock manager.

data.name: DockManagerCreateAutoHideContainer
data.value: Fires after an auto hide container has been created.

data.name: DockManagerDestroyAutoHideContainer
data.value: Fires before an auto hide container has been destroyed.

data.name: DockManagerDocking
data.value: Fires repeatedly while the dock panel is being dragged.

data.name: DockManagerDockingOptions
data.value: Provides access to the settings that affect the behavior of dock panels.

data.name: DockManagerDockMode
data.value: Gets or sets the dock style.

data.name: DockManagerDockModeVS2005FadeFramesCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of frames in the fading animation effect that are applied when displaying dock visualizers (markers) in VS2005 dock style.

data.name: DockManagerDockModeVS2005FadeSpeed
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies the speed of fade effects.

data.name: DockManagerEndDocking
data.value: Fires immediately after a docking operation on a dock panel has finished.

data.name: DockManagerEndSizing
data.value: Fires after a resize operation on a dock panel has finished.

data.name: DockManagerForm
data.value: Gets or sets the container control (form or user control) which displays the dock panels owned by the current dock manager.

data.name: DockManagerImages
data.value: Gets or sets the image source whose images are used by dock panels.

data.name: DockManagerItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to the panels which belong to the dock manager by their names.

data.name: DockManagerLayoutUpgrade
data.value: Occurs after a layout whose version doesn't match the current layout's version has been loaded from storage (a stream, xml file or system registry).

data.name: DockManagerLayoutVersion
data.value: Gets or sets the version of the layout of dock windows.

data.name: DockManagerLoad
data.value: Fires after the docking layout has been loaded.

data.name: DockManagerMenuManager
data.value: Gets or sets an object that controls the look and feel of the DockManager's popup menus.

data.name: DockManagerPopupMenuShowing
data.value: Occurs when a context menu is about to be displayed.

data.name: DockManagerRegisterDockPanel
data.value: Occurs when a new panel is registered within the dock manager.

data.name: DockManagerSerializationOptions
data.value: Provides options which control how a layout of dock panels is stored to/restored from a data store (a stream, xml file or system registry).

data.name: DockManagerShowingDockGuides
data.value: Occurs each time an end-user drags a DockPanel into another panel and allows you to hide specific dock hints and guides.

data.name: DockManagerSizing
data.value: Fires when the dock panel is being resized.

data.name: DockManagerStartDocking
data.value: Fires when a docking operation starts.

data.name: DockManagerStartSizing
data.value: Enables specifying whether end-users can resize the dock panels.

data.name: DockManagerTabbedChanged
data.value: Occurs when a panel's DockPanel.Tabbed property is changed.

data.name: DockManagerTabsPositionChanged
data.value: Fires after a dock panel's DockPanel.TabsPosition property has been changed.

data.name: DockManagerTabsScrollChanged
data.value: Occurs when a panel's DockPanel.TabsScroll property is changed.

data.name: DockManagerToolTipController
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip controller component that controls the appearance, position and content of the hints displayed by the dock panels.

data.name: DockManagerTopZIndexControls
data.value: Gets the string collection that stores the full names of the controls which have the top (high) indexes in the z-order and thus are positioned closest to the form's edges.

data.name: DockManagerUnregisterDockPanel
data.value: Occurs when a panel is removed from the dock manager.

data.name: DockManagerValidateDockPanelOnDeactivate
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Validate method is forcibly called on a dock panel when switching from this dock panel to another one.

data.name: DockManagerValidateFloatFormChildrenOnDeactivate
data.value: Gets or sets whether a float dock panel's controls are validated when the panel is deactivated.

data.name: DockManagerValidateFormChildrenOnDeactivate
data.value: Gets or sets whether the ValidateChildren method is forcibly called on a DockManager parent Form when switching from one dock panel to another.

data.name: DockManagerVisibilityChanged
data.value: Fires after the visible state of any dock panel owned by the dock manager has been changed.

data.name: DockPanelActiveChildChanged
data.value: Fires after the panel's active child has been changed.

data.name: DockPanelAllowBorderColorBlending
data.value: Gets or sets whether to colorize the dock panel's caption and border according to the BorderColor setting in skinning paint schemes.

data.name: DockPanelAllowCustomHeaderButtonsGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether Custom Header Button icons should be painted according to the currently applied skin.

data.name: DockPanelAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current DockPanel icon should be painted in this panel's foreground color.

data.name: DockPanelAppearance
data.value: Specifies the appearance settings for the dock panel's client region.

data.name: DockPanelBackColor
data.value: Gets or sets the panel's background color.

data.name: DockPanelBindingContext

data.name: DockPanelClosedPanel

data.name: DockPanelClosingPanel

data.name: DockPanelCollectionItem
data.value: Provides access to the dock panels with the specified name, contained within the collection.

data.name: DockPanelCustomButtonChecked
data.value: Fires when a custom header button is checked.

data.name: DockPanelCustomButtonClick
data.value: Fires on a regular (push) custom header button click.

data.name: DockPanelCustomButtonUnchecked

data.value: Gets or sets the floating panel's location.

data.name: DockPanelFloatSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of the panel when it is floating.

data.name: DockPanelFloatVertical

data.name: DockPanelFooter
data.value: Gets or sets the current DockPanel's footer.

data.name: DockPanelHeader
data.value: Gets or sets the current DockPanel's header.

data.name: DockPanelHint
data.value: Gets or sets the dock panel's hint text.

data.value: Gets or sets the index of an image associated with the dock panel.

data.name: DockPanelItem

data.value: Gets or sets whether the dock panel can be docked to the right edge of a form (or user control).

data.name: DockPanelOptionsAllowDockTop

data.name: DockPanelOptionsResizeDirection
